hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah said “The Apostle of Allah (ﷺ) forbade that a woman and her maternal aunt and a woman and her paternal aunt are joined in marriage (to the same man).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ أَنْ يُجْمَعَ بَيْنَهُنَّ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Women Whom It Is Disliked To Combine Between (In Marriage)
